name: Dawn's White Christmas Snack Mix
author: dsbinyon
summary: White candy-covered pretzels, marshmallows, cereal, nuts, dried cranberries, and almond flavor! Store in plastic bags. As a variation, you can use holiday-shaped pretzels (bell, tree, etc).
ingredients: 2 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex®)
1 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean Spray® Craisins®)
directions: Mix pretzels, graham crackers, rice cereal squares, cranberries, almonds, and marshmallows together in a large bowl
Line a large baking sheet or your countertop with waxed paper
Melt almond bark in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 15-second intervals, stirring after each melting, 1 to 3 minutes
Add almond extract and immediately toss into the bowl with the snack mixture
Spread onto the waxed paper by hand to make a thin layer
Let cool until almond bark is set, 1 to 2 hours
